localize.description: See what's buzzing on The Economist in your native language

localize.title: エコノミスト人気の記事
localize.description: 人気のエコノミスト記事を日本語で閲覧

blogPost.title: The EU may introduce a vaccine passport called a Digital Green Pass which would allow inoculated citizens to travel more freely. Our Special report looks at how travel will resume after the pandemic https://t.co/5hr7Urcmcs
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 欧盟可能会推出一种名为 "数字绿色通行证 "的疫苗护照，允许接种疫苗的公民更自由地旅行。我们的特别报道将探讨大流行后如何恢复旅行https://t.co/5hr7Urcmcs。
歐盟可能會推出一種名爲 "數字綠色通行證 "的疫苗護照，允許接種疫苗的公民更自由地旅行。我們的特別報道將探討大流行後如何恢復旅行https://t.co/5hr7Urcmcs。

previous.title: As news from Ethiopia’s Tigray region emerges, claims of war crimes are mounting. On “The Intelligence” @TomGardner18 unpicks an increasingly complex civil war https://t.co/EBPmDmzs4g

localize.full_text: 随着来自埃塞俄比亚提格雷地区的消息出现，关于战争罪的指控越来越多。在 "情报 "节目中 @TomGardner18解读日益复杂的内战https://t.co/EBPmDmzs4g。
隨着來自埃塞俄比亞提格雷地區的消息出現，關於戰爭罪的指控越來越多。在 "情報 "節目中 @TomGardner18解讀日益複雜的內戰https://t.co/EBPmDmzs4g。

next.title: Eugen Sandow was the Victorian who figured out how to make fitness appealing. His celebrity fans included King George V and Arthur Conan Doyle https://t.co/xGGHqnn00e

localize.full_text: Eugen Sandow是维多利亚时代的人，他想出了如何让健身变得有吸引力。他的名人粉丝包括英王乔治五世和亚瑟-柯南道尔https://t.co/xGGHqnn00e。
Eugen Sandow是維多利亞時代的人，他想出瞭如何讓健身變得有吸引力。他的名人粉絲包括英王喬治五世和亞瑟-柯南道爾https://t.co/xGGHqnn00e。
